text.div:
SNOMED CT Supply Item

This value set includes SNOMED CT where concept is-a 105590001 (Substance (substance)) or concept is-a 260787004 (Physical object) and provided as an example value set.

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organization (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 105590001 (Substance)
  • Include codes from http://snomed.info/sct where concept is-a 260787004 (Physical object)

name: SNOMED CT Supply Item
